title: Trump declares war on Tech Giants to halt soaring electric bills, forces data centers to fund new power plants
description: In an unprecedented emergency intervention, the Trump administration is preparing to confront the nation’s spiraling electricity crisis by directly targeting the trillion-dollar technology industry. title: 97% of listeners ‘can’t tell real music from AI creations’
description: A staggering 97% of listeners are unable to distinguish between music created by artificial intelligence and tracks composed by humans, a survey conducted by the music streaming service Deezer and the market research firm Ipsos has found.
content:

title: X offers safeguards as Philippines weighs blocking Grok
description: MANILA: The owner and developer of the artificial intelligence chatbot Grok has formally reached out to the Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT), proposing corrective measures as the government weighs blocking the tool over concerns about sexually explicit deepfakes.

description: At the Jaipur Literature Festival, Nobel Prize-winning economist Esther Duflo discussed the updated edition of her book ‘Poor Economics’ and highlighted issues like social protection, climate change, and the impact of artificial intelligence on India’s economy. title: Global sports face challenges from 'AI slop' misinformation
description: Jan 16 - A study by AI risk management platform Alethea into the surge in artificial intelligence-generated fake content, dubbed \"AI slop,\" has warned sports teams, leagues and fans of the risks posed by increasingly sophisticated digital misinformation.
